summary: In the 19th century, an expert marine biologist is hired by the government to determine what's sinking ships all over the ocean. His daughter follows him. They are intercepted by a mysterious captain Nemo and his incredible submarine.
cast: Richard Crenna|Ben Cross|Julie Cox|Paul Gross|Michael Jayston|Jeff Harding|David Henry|James Vaughan|Susannah Fellows|Joshua Brody|Jess Liaudin
keywords: psychotronic film|sub rams ship|brig|harpoon|woman wears boots
title: 20.000 leguas de viaje submarino
